def calculate_max_edges(n, m, k, government_nodes, edges):
    lista = [[] for _ in range(n)]
    for (u, v) in edges:
        lista[u - 1].append(v - 1)
        lista[v - 1].append(u - 1)
    usado = [False] * n
    parc1 = 0
    parc2 = -1

    def calc(valor):
        nonlocal x, y
        x += 1
        usado[valor] = True
        y += len(lista[valor])
        for i in lista[valor]:
            if not usado[i]:
                calc(i)
    for gov_node in government_nodes:
        x = 0
        y = 0
        calc(gov_node - 1)
        parc1 += (x * (x - 1) - y) // 2
        parc2 = max(parc2, x)
        n -= x
    aux3 = 0
    for i in range(len(lista)):
        if not usado[i]:
            aux3 += len(lista[i])
    parc1 -= ((parc2 + n) * (n + parc2 - 1) - parc2 * (parc2 - 1)) // 2
    maximum_number = parc1 - aux3 // 2
    return maximum_number
